titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that the expenses of special-order speeches be paid from the Members Representational Allowance of the Members making the speeches.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/6/2001--Introduced. Amends rule XVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that the expenses of any special-order speech be paid from the Members Representational Allowance of the Member making the speech.
